BILLY1.original: ~r~Brian is dead.
Get on your ~b~bike.
~r~Jason is dead.
Johnny will need the bike to ride in convoy with the other Lost bikers.
BILLY1.translated: 只有骑在摩托上，Johnny才能在失落帮车队中骑行。

BILLY1.original: ~s~Use ~PAD_DPAD_LEFTRIGHT~ to cycle between radio stations when in a vehicle.
Follow ~b~Billy~s~ back to The Lost clubhouse.
Wait for ~b~Billy.
You can use the Lost Clubhouse computer to access the Internet.
BILLY1.translated: 还可以使用失落帮会所的电脑上网。

BILLY1.original: Ride to The Lost ~y~clubhouse.
~r~Terry is dead.
~r~Clay is dead.
Ride to the ~y~chop shop.
Watch the latest shows on TV.
BILLY1.translated: 打开电视收看最新节目。

BILLY1.original: Get off your bike.
This is Johnny's Hexer. It's the only one of its kind in Liberty City.~n~A modern classic chopper with a 2032cc twin cam engine and 6 speed transmission with a final chain drive.
BILLY1.translated: 这是Johnny的Hexer，在自由城独一无二。它是一台现代复古摩托，搭载2032cc双凸轮发动机与六速变速箱，采用链条传动。

BILLY1.original: You can arm wrestle with your brothers.
BILLY1.translated: 你可以和兄弟们掰手腕。

BILLY1.original: ~r~Your bike was wrecked.
Try your luck in a hi-lo card game.
BILLY1.translated: 在猜大小的牌局中测人品。

BILLY1.original: Ride back to the ~y~clubhouse.
You are too far away from ~b~Billy.~s~ Ride closer to your group.
BILLY1.translated: 你离~b~Billy~s~太远了，跟上你的车队。

BILLY1.original: This is the Lost clubhouse.
~r~Billy is dead.
~s~Press ~INPUT_VEH_ACCELERATE~ to accelerate. Press ~INPUT_VEH_BRAKE~ to brake or reverse if the vehicle is stopped.
BILLY1.translated: 按~INPUT_VEH_ACCELERATE~加速。按~INPUT_VEH_BRAKE~刹车，在车辆停止时可倒车。

BILLY1.original: ~r~Jim is dead.
Destroy all of the ~r~machines.
Get back on your ~b~bike.
Enter and stay on the badge to hold the gang formation. This will increase your health and repair your bike.
BILLY1.translated: 在会徽内骑行以保持队形，这将增加你的生命值和护甲，修复你的摩托。

BILLY1.original: When leading a group of bikers, stay close to them to hear them talk.
BILLY1.translated: 带领车队时，接近队友才能听见他们的对话。

BILLY1.original: Terry will deliver guns to your location.
BILLY1.translated: Terry会将武器送至你的所在地。

BILLY1.original: Press ~INPUT_ENTER~ to enter or exit a vehicle.
Get back on your ~b~bike~s~ and follow Billy.
Take out the ~r~Angels of Death.
Ride to the Angels of Death ~y~hangout.
BILLY1.translated: 骑车前往死亡天使~y~所在地。

BILLY1.original: ~r~A Lost bike was wrecked.
When riding in a convoy, hold ~INPUT_VEH_CIN_CAM~ to focus the camera on the leader.
BILLY1.translated: 车队骑行时，按住~INPUT_VEH_CIN_CAM~将镜头对准领队。

BILLY1.original: Follow ~b~Billy.
You can save any vehicle in the parking place outside your safehouse.
BILLY1.translated: 会所外的停车位可以存放任何载具。

BILLY1.original: ~s~Use ~INPUT_VEH_NEXT_RADIO~ or ~INPUT_VEH_PREV_RADIO~ to cycle between radio stations when in a vehicle.
Ride to where the machines are being ~y~unloaded.
~r~Billy's bike was wrecked.
~s~Press ~INPUT_VEH_HANDBRAKE~ to use the handbrake.
You have left ~b~Billy~s~ behind, go and get him.
When leading a group of bikers, hold ~INPUT_VEH_CIN_CAM~ to switch the camera to the group point of view.
BILLY1.translated: 带领车队时，按住~INPUT_VEH_CIN_CAM~切换至车队视角。

BILLY1.original: If you lose your ride, a phone call to Clay will get you an alternative bike.
BILLY1.translated: 若你失去了你的座驾，给Clay打个电话就能得到备用摩托。

BILLY1.original: ~s~Press ~INPUT_VEH_HANDBRAKE~ to use the handbrake. ~n~Press ~PAD_A~ for alternative handbrake (Standard controls).
BILLY1.translated: ~s~按~INPUT_VEH_HANDBRAKE~使用手刹。~n~按~PAD_A~也是手刹(标准键位下)。

BILLY1.original: A Lost Motorcycle Club badge will appear behind Billy when cruising in a gang.
BILLY1.translated: 车队行进时，Billy车后会出现失落摩托帮的会徽。

BILLY1.original: Get back on your ~b~bike.
~r~Your bike was wrecked.
~r~A member of The Lost is dead.
And pay your respects to fallen comrades.
Sleeping on the bed will save the game and advance time by six hours.
BILLY1.translated: 上床睡觉会保存游戏进度，并将时间推进6个小时。

BILLY1.original: ~r~You abandoned your bike.
You can hang out and take part in activities with fellow members of The Lost.
BILLY1.translated: 你可以与失落帮的其他成员一起出行，进行各种活动。
